ratings.comment: Noah was an amazing professor, and a really engaging lecturer. The readings were sometimes difficult and long, but Noah very concisely describes the main ideas clearly in the lectures. Highly recommend.

Noah is a great professor who cares about his students. His grading structure makes it easy for students to remain in good standing while still engaging students with material. Completed 100 pages of reading per class (noted its a literature class) but not to hard to get through. One of my favorite professors thus far.

Fantastic class and a professor who genuinely cared about students and their learning over grades and exams. The readings were challenging, but if you attend lectures and keep up with notes, it's totally doable, since Noah explains everything really comprehensively and concisely! 10/10 recommend this prof and huge fan of standards grading!
